text:
Elizabeth Jean Andrew-Oates (28 February 1948 – 12 April 1993) was an Australian politician. He was a member of the Country Liberal Party. She served as the member for Sanderson in the Northern Territory Legislative Assembly from 1974 to 1977.
Andrew was born in Bordertown, South Australia. She was married twice and had two children. In 1989, she was diagnosed with cancer. She died on 12 April 1993 in Adelaide, South Australia, at the age of 45.
